post.description:
Retrieves user's financial transaction history.
Bit8 operation: gamingPortalService.transactionGetAccountTransactionsAdvancedWithOptions
Filter criteria names: Modifiers, PaymentUID, BalanceTransactionID, TransactionTypeName, TransactionTypeID
Filter conditions: INCLUDE, EXCLUDE, GREATER_THAN, SMALLER_THAN, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO, SMALLER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO
Filter criteria values: AllBalanceTransactions
Order criteria names: BalanceTransactionID, Timestamp, Amount, TransactionStatus, PaymentUID, TransactionTypeName, TransactionTypeID, PaymentMethodName, TransactionStatusName
Order conditions: ASC, DESC
Valid fields to pass: startDate, endDate
Valid format for date format: YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The account transactions filtering options

parameters.name: sessionToken
parameters.description: The authorization of the user that was provided upon authentication

sessionId.description: Session key in Bit8 System provided in game launch URL or by Start Session.

playerBalanceInfo.description: The player's balance is a component of two figures real and bonus. Typically the player is only displayed a summation of these two values.

currency.description: Should match currency provided in game launch URL.

feature.description: If the player has any free rounds, every free round will be returned in this field as an array item, containing the attributes shown in the next column.

Session key in Bit8 System provided in game launch URL or by Start Session.

extTransactionId.description: The Transaction ID in Bit8 system used to identify the players game_play (transactions [bets/wins/rollback] processed during a game session.

gameRoundId.description: The Round ID in Bit8 system used to identify the players round.

playerId.description: Player ID in Bit8 System provided in game launch URL

sessionId.description: Session key in Bit8 System provided in game launch URL or by Start Session.

gameReference.description: Though not necessary extra validation can be performed if game is supplied. Also for rollback transactions it is allowed not to pass the session_id if the game is provided

transactionId.description: Unique transaction ID\Key in game provider's system. This is used to check whether the transaction has already been processed or not. In case of a rollback transaction this is the ID of the bet transaction.

roundId.description: Shared ID between a bet & win transactions. This is used by the win\rollback transaction to partition winnings between real and bonus.

amount.description: The gross transaction amount in cents. Should be zero in case of a free round bet.

netAmount.description: Net winning amount in cents. Must be smaller or equal to gross amount (if tax isnt deducted)

closeRound.description: Used by the win transaction to close the round. This can be used to reduce a call to end round. Zero based wins can be passed.

freeRoundRule.description: If the transaction is funded from a free round the field contains a unique identifier for the free round rule. Typically the winnings of free rounds are not credited to real funds but are awarded as a bonus. This field is used to detect which bonus settings to apply (e.g. wagering requirement and games applied). This field should be populated only if the transaction is funded from a free round. This field can be omitted if the free_round_pid is provided.

freeRoundPid.description: This is the players free round instance ID used to identify the Bit8 free rounds instance awarded to the player. Although this field can be omitted if the free_round_rule field is supplied this is not recommend since a player can be awarded multiple free rounds instances from the same rule.

freeRoundUnits.description: The number of free rounds that the player is eligible by the offer referenced by the free_round_rule or free_round_pid. If this is bet transaction this value should be the number of free rounds before the bet. This value is important because Bit8 needs to know when the free rounds have been exhausted.

status.description:
status_code	description
0	INIT
1	DEFINED
2	ACTIVE
3	COMPLETED
4	DISTRIBUTED_CALCULATED
5	WINNING_NUMBERS_ENTERED
6	WINNERS_CALCULATED
7	WINNERS_UPDATED
15	WINNING_NUMBERS_ENTERED_PAYMENTS_SUSPENDED
16	WINNERS_CALCULATED_PAYMENTS_SUSPENDED
17	WINNERS_UPDATED_PAYMENTS_SUSPENDED
